subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Mr. Olah was a 4-foot-8-inch, 90-pound jockey who later became a giant in the thoroughbred industry among the jockeys and owners whose colorful silks he cleaned for more than 40 years.
snippet: Mr. Olah was a 4-foot-8-inch, 90-pound jockey who later became a giant in the thoroughbred industry among the jockeys and owners whose colorful silks he cleaned for more than 40 years.
